title: Politiburo standing committee most power in China

content.question: The political institution that exerts the most power in China is the

choices.label: Standing Committee of the Politburo of the Chinese Communist Party
Standing Committee of the National People’s Congress
State Council of the National People’s Congress
Secretariat of the Politburo of the Chinese Communist Party
National Party Congress of the Chinese Communist Party

content.answer: Standing Committee of the Politburo of the Chinese Communist Party

skill.text: Skill 1.D: Describe political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors of a course country.
